{/* Header Section */}

Azure Data Engineering

Master the skills needed to design and implement data solutions on Azure, including data storage, processing, and analytics.

{/* Video Preview Section */}

Course Preview

{/* Instructor & CTA Section */}

Jessica Green

Senior Azure Data Engineer & Instructor

{/* Course Overview Section */}

Course Overview

This comprehensive course covers the essential skills for data engineering on Azure, including:

  • Data storage solutions in Azure
  • Data processing with Azure Data Factory
  • Data analytics with Azure Synapse Analytics
  • Implementing data lakes and data warehouses
  • Real-time data processing with Azure Stream Analytics
  • Data governance and security best practices
{/* Topics Accordion Section */}

Topics Covered
